removes the Action at a given index position from the event

removes a given component from this event, if it was included.
removeComponent(String) - Method in class eea.engine.entity.Entity

removeEntity(int, Entity) - Method in class eea.engine.entity.StateBasedEntityManager
removes the concrete entity from the selected state
RemoveEventAction - Class in eea.engine.action.basicactions
The RemoveEventAction is a straightforward action that is used to remove the chosen event from the underlying entity.

render(GameContainer, StateBasedGame, Graphics) - Method in class eea.engine.component.render.AnimationRenderComponent
The abstract method for rendering the current component based on the GameContainer, the current state of the game, and the Graphics context.
render(GameContainer, StateBasedGame, Graphics) - Method in class eea.engine.component.render.ImageRenderComponent
Rendering an image is performed based on the underlying entity's current position and scale.
render(GameContainer, StateBasedGame, Graphics) - Method in class eea.engine.component.RenderComponent
The abstract method for rendering the current component based on the GameContainer, the current state of the game, and the Graphics context.
render(GameContainer, StateBasedGame, Graphics) - Method in class eea.engine.entity.Entity
Invokes the RenderComponent.render(GameContainer, StateBasedGame, Graphics) method on the rendering component for this entity, provided there is one and that the current entity is visible (which by default it is).
RenderComponent - Class in eea.engine.component
A RenderComponent is an abstract component that is used as a base for all game entities that can be rendered (shown on the game screen).
RenderComponent(String) - Constructor for class eea.engine.component.RenderComponent
Creates a new RenderComponent with the given ID
renderEntities(GameContainer, StateBasedGame, Graphics) - Method in class eea.engine.entity.StateBasedEntityManager
causes all entities in the current game state to render themselves Invokes the Entity.render(GameContainer, StateBasedGame, Graphics) method on all entities in the current game state
RotateLeftAction - Class in eea.engine.action.basicactions
A RotateLeftAction is an action used to model the rotation of an entity to the left, more precisely: in counter-clockwise direction.
RotateLeftAction(float) - Constructor for class eea.engine.action.basicactions.RotateLeftAction
Creates a new RotateLeftAction with the concrete rotation speed passed in.
RotateRightAction - Class in eea.engine.action.basicactions
A RotateLeftAction is an action used to model the rotation of an entity to the left, more precisely: in clockwise direction.
RotateRightAction(float) - Constructor for class eea.engine.action.basicactions.RotateRightAction
Creates a new RotateRightAction with the concrete rotation speed passed in.
